name: ai-finance-dashboard
description: AI-powered personal finance dashboard with real-time analytics

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && pnpm dev" "cd frontend && pnpm dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && pnpm start" "cd frontend && pnpm start"
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: Nikhil Mhatre
